title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Fry the pancetta/bacon until crispy with garlic, then remove garlic.
Beat eggs in a bowl, mix with grated Parmesan.
Drain pasta and quickly mix with bacon and egg-cheese mixture.
Season with black pepper and serve hot.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka masala paste for at least 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until browned.
In a pan, fry onions until golden, add tomatoes and cook.
Add cream, simmer, then mix in grilled chicken.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: Toasted bread topped with creamy avocado, olive oil, and chili flakes.
instructions: Toast the bread slices until golden.
Mash avocado with salt, pepper, and olive oil.
Sprinkle with chili flakes and serve immediately.
